Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IPeerApplicationManager
    Peer application manager.
    IPeerApplicationReader
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of reading objects from a peer application.
    IPeerApplicationResultSet
    Interface to be implemented by classes which represent the result of reading from a peer application via IPeerApplicationReader.read().
    IPeerApplicationWriter
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of writing objects to a a peer application.
    ISharedFixSource
    Objects of this type route messages to different IFIXSource objects based on the the IParty associated with the message.
    IsTechnologyAdapter
    Marker interface to indicate that the adapters can be used as a routing end point in the Rules dashboard UI.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PeerApplicationManager
    Default IPeerApplicationManager implementation.
    PeerApplicationManagerService
    This class is a simple IService wrapper around a PeerApplicationManager for the purposes of sharing a single IPeerApplicationWriter and IPeerApplicationReader amongst multiple components.
    SharedFixSourceHelper
    Default implementation of ISharedFixSource.
    TechnologyAdapterBase
    Simple base class for technology adapter message processors.
    TechnologyAdapterFIXSendingTransformer
    Abstract IMessageTransformer implementation for transforming messages between Catalys and Technology Adapter-specific objects.
    TechnologyAdapterMessageLogger
    Provides FIX message logging for messages to/from a technology adapter.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PeerApplicationException
    An exception indicating that an error occurred while communicating with a peer application.
